name: Succulents
description: Plants with thick fleshy parts adapted to store water

name: Cacti
description: Succulent plants with unique areoles and often spines

name: Ferns
description: Vascular plants that reproduce via spores and have neither seeds nor flowers

name: Vines and Climbers
description: Plants with a climbing or trailing growth habit

name: Bromeliads
description: Tropical plants often with rosette growth and colorful leaves or flowers

name: Carnivorous Plants
description: Plants that trap and digest insects

name: Orchids
description: Plants with complex flowers and often epiphytic growth habits
